sampleNote: Next.js is a React framework that enables server-side rendering and static site generation, providing a powerful toolset for building fast and SEO-friendly web applications. It offers features like file-based routing, API routes, and automatic code splitting, which enhance development efficiency and application performance. Additionally, Next.js supports CSS and Sass for styling and includes an image optimization component to improve page load times. Getting started with Next.js involves simple setup commands and allows for easy creation of pages and navigation between them, making it a go-to choice for modern web development.
